content.rendered:
>Elite Access It is a new high-level facial recognition device with superior facial recognition capability
The recognition capability is supported with ZKTeco’s powerful dedicated CPU and the very large capacity of face templates, up to a maximum of 50,000 face templates for 1: N recognition.
Thanks to its powerful core and the latest facial recognition algorithm, Elite Access quickly recognizes a face within 0.3 seconds, while effectively preventing any type of printing attack
With a powerful anti-plagiarism algorithm.

deteils

Data Sheet

excerpt.rendered:
• Unrivaled speed of Face Recognition (less than 0.3 seconds per face)
• A 2-megapixel Starlight CMOS sensor camera with WDR function, which enables the terminal to recognize faces
• Under difficult lighting environment (0.5 Lux – 50000 Lux)
• Anti-plagiarism algorithm against printing attack (laser, color, black and white images), video clips attack and three-dimensional mask attack
• Intelligent energy-saving design. The microwave detector will wake up the device when it detects accurately
• The distance between the user and the device is 3 meters (9.84 ft) or less
